nodes.text: Venra Andsof was a female Lorrdian diplomat who served as the assistant to the ambassador Milac Troper. At some point during galactic history, Andsof accompanied Troper to the herdship Galactic Horizon, to attend some peace talks. However, the former scout Dayla Kev hijacked the conference, seeking revenge against Troper for abandoning her to die on a jungle world many years earlier. Kev and her allies released various dangerous predators aboard the ship, driving Andsof, Troper and several of their security guards deep into the jungle biosphere of the ship, while falling under constant attack from the creatures.
